webforest 0.2.1

  • Changelog

Column helper: Sample size / count

Source: R/classes-components.R
col_n.Rd

Display integer counts with thousands separator for readability.

col_n(
  field = "n",
  header = "N",
  width = NULL,
  decimals = 0,
  digits = NULL,
  thousands_sep = ",",
  abbreviate = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

field

Field name (default "n")

header

Column header (default "N")

width

Column width in pixels (NULL for auto-sizing based on content)

decimals

Number of decimal places (default 0 for integers). Cannot be used with digits.

digits

Number of significant figures. Cannot be used with decimals.

thousands_sep

Thousands separator (default "," for integer columns)

abbreviate

Logical. When TRUE, values >= 1000 are shortened with at most 1 decimal place (e.g., 1100 -> "1.1K", 12345 -> "12.3K"). Default FALSE.

...

Additional arguments passed to web_col(), including cell styling: bold, italic, color, bg, emphasis, muted, accent (column names)

Value

A ColumnSpec object

Examples

# Default: shows "12,345" for large numbers
col_n("n")
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "n"
#>  @ header        : chr "N"
#>  @ field         : chr "n"
#>  @ type          : chr "numeric"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "left"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ numeric:List of 4
#>  ..  ..$ decimals    : num 0
#>  ..  ..$ digits      : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ thousandsSep: chr ","
#>  ..  ..$ abbreviate  : logi FALSE
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL

# Disable thousands separator
col_n("n", thousands_sep = FALSE)
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "n"
#>  @ header        : chr "N"
#>  @ field         : chr "n"
#>  @ type          : chr "numeric"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "left"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ numeric:List of 4
#>  ..  ..$ decimals    : num 0
#>  ..  ..$ digits      : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ thousandsSep: logi FALSE
#>  ..  ..$ abbreviate  : logi FALSE
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
#>  @ style_badge   : NULL
#>  @ style_icon    : NULL
#>  @ style_emphasis: NULL
#>  @ style_muted   : NULL
#>  @ style_accent  : NULL

# Abbreviate large sample sizes: 12,345 -> "12.3K"
col_n("n", abbreviate = TRUE)
#> <webforest::ColumnSpec>
#>  @ id            : chr "n"
#>  @ header        : chr "N"
#>  @ field         : chr "n"
#>  @ type          : chr "numeric"
#>  @ width         : chr "auto"
#>  @ align         : chr "left"
#>  @ header_align  : chr NA
#>  @ wrap          : logi FALSE
#>  @ position      : chr "left"
#>  @ sortable      : logi TRUE
#>  @ options       :List of 1
#>  .. $ numeric:List of 4
#>  ..  ..$ decimals    : num 0
#>  ..  ..$ digits      : NULL
#>  ..  ..$ thousandsSep: chr ","
#>  ..  ..$ abbreviate  : logi TRUE
#>  @ style_bold    : NULL
#>  @ style_italic  : NULL
#>  @ style_color   : NULL
#>  @ style_bg      : NULL
